about_the_game:
Three brand new stories are available in "Kingdom Heroes 8": " Unified the World by Jin ", " The War of Heroines ", and " Reigning in troubled times ", and new forces such as the Japanese army and new generals such as Peimi Hoo added.

" Unified the World by Jin " story background
After Sima Zhao conquered Shu, Sima Yan usurped the Wei throne and established Jin Dynasty.
With the development of productivity and national power, it is foreseen that unification of the central plains is possible.
Or are you satisfied with the temporary peace and waiting for the change?
Let's see whose flags will flutter in the wind in the end.

" The War of Heroines " story background
In this unknown age,heroines emerge in endlessly.
The world is theirs to take, and the battle is about to begin...

" Reigning in troubled times " story background
The turbulent times are coming.
Flame of wars blaze across the land, the ominous stars streak across the sky and anomalies come with it.
Heroes from different time and space are assembled here at the time of Three Kingdoms.
For the supremacy, they will rival against each other.
Behold, the bloodbaths will usher in an new era of legends...

Notice:
1. This DLC can only be used in the game library containing " Kingdom Heroes 8".
2.15% discount for purchasing "The Hibiscus storm clouds", "Self-Made Warriors Expansion Pack" and "God Zhao Yun DLC Combo Pack".
